name: messages
code_text1:
With our 2-Step Verification, you can rest assured that the election data is secure.
To access this option, you'll simply need to enter a unique five-digit code, adding
an extra layer of protection to your election process. So whether you're accessing
sensitive data or simply want to ensure the safety of election records, our
2-Step Verification has got you covered.
code_text2:
Once data is locked, it's important to note that candidate records cannot be changed 
until the lock is removed. This added layer of security helps ensure the accuracy and 
reliability of your data. So before locking any data, be sure to double-check that all 
candidate records are accurate and up-to-date.
